verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Verse:
Light the coal fan the flame
Passion for Your holy name

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Chorus:
Fire of God consume our souls
No matter where we are or were we go
Fire of God consume our souls tonight

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Bridge:
I just wanna burn with a love so pure
A passion for Your name with Your flame in my soul
I just wanna burn with a love so pure tonight
